def src.mapServers.googleMaps.parse_start_page (   layer,
  html 
)

Parse maps.google.com/maps.

google always change this page and map api, we use a specific method to do the parser work. the return value is a url pattern like this: http://mt%d.google.com/vt/lyrs=t@110&hl=en&x=%i&y=%i&z=%i
